name: Vitamin
tagline: The Cure for the Common Brand®
description:
Vitamin® is a boutique web and public relations agency that intensifies the strength and awareness of each client's brand by taking an integrated approach to marketing-communications.
The result? Vitamin delivers the nutrients that work together to increase exposure, motivate target audiences, and ultimately drive revenue. Inherently sales-focused and intrinsically message-driven marketing. This is the Cure for the Common Brand®.
